channel.title: Subway / Underground Station
channel.description:
hello,
its possible to create this? i have an area with many, many platforms on a: "ground > quater pipe > 8xX foundation [ 8x4 gap from " FOUNDATIONINDUSTRIES" ] > inverted quater pipe > 8xX foundation [ split foundations from " FOUNDATIONINDUSTRIES" > way for pipes ]" ~ 32 m high >>> the max hight need to be 30 - 35 m ... if is possible to transform the original stations to an half of this and the freight-stations with an front- / side-loader-system or any other function.

item.title: Subway / Underground Station
item.dc:creator: @sky_zuma Skyzuma
item.description:
@sky_zuma wrote:

hello,

its possible to create this? i have an area with many, many platforms on a: “ground > quater pipe > 8xX foundation [ 8x4 gap from " FOUNDATIONINDUSTRIES” ] > inverted quater pipe > 8xX foundation [ split foundations from " FOUNDATIONINDUSTRIES" > way for pipes ]" ~ 32 m high >>> the max hight need to be 30 - 35 m … if is possible to transform the original stations to an half of this and the freight-stations with an front- / side-loader-system or any other function.
